content:
Beverly Hills, CA! I've got you covered.

Here are some sports bars in the 90210 area code that show Premier League games:

1. **The Parlor** (10433 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90024) - They open at 8 am on Sundays and show Premier League games. They also have a breakfast menu to go along with your coffee.
2. **The Village Inn** (9225 Sunset Blvd, West Hollywood, CA 90069) - They open at 9 am on Sundays and show Premier League games. They have a full breakfast menu and a wide selection of beers.
3. **The Britannia Pub** (318 Santa Monica Blvd, Santa Monica, CA 90401) - This is a popular spot for English football fans, and they open at 7:30 am on Sundays. They have a full English breakfast menu and a wide selection of beers.
4. **The Fox and Hounds** (11100 Ventura Blvd, Studio City, CA 91604) - They open at 8 am on Sundays and show Premier League games. They have a breakfast menu and a wide selection of beers.
5. **The Greyhound Bar and Grill** (5570 N Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CA 90042) - They open at 9 am on Sundays and show Premier League games. They have a breakfast menu and a wide selection of beers.

Please note that opening times and Premier League game schedules are subject to change, so it's always a good idea to call ahead or check the bar's website or social media to confirm.

As for opening early on Sundays, most of these bars open around 8-9 am, which should give you plenty of time to catch the early morning Premier League matches with your coffee and breakfast.

Enjoy the games, and may Manchester City continue their winning streak!
